file_insights.changes_summary: Added comprehensive constants for slash mechanics, including energy, power, and pattern recognition systems

patterns_discovered: Detailed game mechanic configuration with clear comments
Systematic documentation of multipliers and thresholds
Separation of concerns in constant definitions
gotchas_discovered: Precise configuration of game mechanics requires careful tuning
Multiple configurable aspects of slash mechanics (energy, power, pattern)
Potential performance implications of complex pattern recognition
recommendations: Consider creating a TypeScript type for power levels to improve type safety
Add comments explaining the rationale behind specific multiplier values
Create a configuration validation function to ensure constants are within reasonable ranges
Consider extracting these constants to a configuration file for easier tuning
